Tag.description: A label for tagging Environment resource

Key.description: A string used to identify this tag

Value.description: A string containing the value for the tag

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 20  

Maximum Length: 2048  

Pattern: ^arn:(aws[a-zA-Z-]*)?:refactor-spaces:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\w{12}:[a-zA-Z_0-9+=,.@\-_/]+$  

Update requires: No interruption

ApplicationIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 14  

Maximum Length: 14  

Pattern: ^app-([0-9A-Za-z]{10}$)  

Update requires: No interruption

Description.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 256  

Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9-_\s\.\!\*\#\@\']+$  

Update requires: No interruption

EndpointType.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type:      

Update requires: No interruption

EnvironmentIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 14  

Maximum Length: 14  

Pattern: ^env-([0-9A-Za-z]{10}$)  

Update requires: No interruption

LambdaEndpoint.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type:      

Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 3  

Maximum Length: 63  

Pattern: ^(?!svc-)[a-zA-Z0-9]+[a-zA-Z0-9-_ ]+$  

Update requires: No interruption

ServiceIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 14  

Maximum Length: 14  

Pattern: ^svc-([0-9A-Za-z]{10}$)  

Update requires: No interruption

UrlEndpoint.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type:      

Update requires: No interruption

VpcId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 12  

Maximum Length: 21  

Pattern: ^vpc-[-a-f0-9]{8}([-a-f0-9]{9})?$  

Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: Metadata that you can assign to help organize the frameworks that you create. Each tag is a key-value pair.
Tags.markdownDescription:
Metadata that you can assign to help organize the frameworks that you create. Each tag is a key-value pair.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption
